title: Did Fire Caused by Gender Reveal Party Damage More Property Than 2020 Protests?
subtitle: The viral claim seemed to be an attempt to counter U.S. President Donald Trump's framing of Black Lives Matter protests.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: In 2020, a California wildfire caused by a pyrotechnic device at a baby's gender reveal party caused more property damage than all U.S. Black Lives Matter protests that year combined.
